declarations.bibleVerseText: When all the kings who were vassals of Hadadezer saw that they had been routed by Israel, they made peace with the Israelites and became subject to them.

declarations.text: God’s promises are true, and I walk in His abundant blessings.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Then David said, 'God has broken through my enemies before me, like a breakthrough of water.'

declarations.text: I walk in wisdom, and God blesses me with understanding and discernment.
declarations.bibleVerseText: So give your servant a discerning heart to govern your people and to distinguish between right and wrong.

declarations.text: God grants me wisdom beyond measure, and I use it to lead and serve others.
declarations.bibleVerseText: God gave Solomon wisdom and very great insight, and a breadth of understanding as measureless as the sand on the seashore.

declarations.text: I trust in God’s faithfulness, and His promises bring peace to my life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Praise be to the Lord, who has given rest to his people Israel just as he promised. Not one word has failed of all the good promises he gave.

declarations.text: God hears my prayers, and He answers with mercy and grace.
declarations.bibleVerseText: May your eyes be open toward this temple night and day, this place of which you said, ‘My Name shall be there.’

declarations.text: I walk in obedience to God's commands, and He strengthens my path.
declarations.bibleVerseText: If you walk before me faithfully with integrity of heart and uprightness, I will establish your royal throne over Israel forever.

declarations.text: God’s wisdom guides me, and I build my life on His foundation of truth.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Solomon gave orders to build a temple for the Name of the Lord and a royal palace for himself.

declarations.text: I seek God’s presence daily, and His Spirit fills me with peace and joy.
declarations.bibleVerseText: When the priests withdrew from the Holy Place, the cloud filled the temple of the Lord.

declarations.text: I am chosen by God, and His favor rests upon me wherever I go.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord appeared to Solomon a second time, as he had appeared to him at Gibeon.

declarations.text: I find strength in the Lord, and He leads me to victory in every battle.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord will strike down any nation that rises against Israel, just as He promised.

declarations.text: I am blessed because I seek God’s wisdom and walk in His ways.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Solomon asked for a discerning heart, and God granted him both wisdom and wealth.

declarations.text: God's love surrounds me, and I find refuge in His faithfulness.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord our God be with us, as he was with our ancestors; may he never leave us nor forsake us.

declarations.text: God’s word is true, and His promises bring peace to my life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Not one word has failed of all the good promises he gave through his servant Moses.

declarations.text: I trust in God’s faithfulness, and He blesses my life with peace and prosperity.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Blessed be the Lord, who has given rest to his people, just as He promised.

declarations.text: I walk in God’s favor, and His presence guides me each day.
declarations.bibleVerseText: When Solomon had finished building the temple of the Lord, the Lord said, ‘I have consecrated this temple by putting my Name there forever.’

declarations.text: God is with me, and He gives me the wisdom to lead and serve others.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Now, O Lord my God, you have made your servant king in place of my father David. But I am only a little child and do not know how to carry out my duties.

declarations.text: I trust in God's promises, and He establishes my steps in righteousness.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Walk in obedience to all I command you, and I will establish your royal throne.

declarations.text: I seek God’s wisdom in all things, and He grants me insight and clarity.
declarations.bibleVerseText: When all Israel heard the verdict the king had given, they held the king in awe, because they saw that he had wisdom from God to administer justice.

declarations.text: God blesses me with understanding, and I use it to bless others.

declarations.text: God’s promises are unchanging, and I find peace in His faithfulness.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Not one word has failed of all the good promises he gave.

declarations.text: God is my refuge and strength, and I trust in His unchanging love.
declarations.bibleVerseText: May the Lord our God be with us as he was with our ancestors; may he never leave us nor forsake us.

declarations.text: God is my strength, and He makes me victorious in every battle.

declarations.text: I seek the Lord’s wisdom, and He leads me in paths of righteousness.

declarations.text: God is my provider, and He sustains me with all I need.

declarations.text: I trust in God's provision, and He meets all my needs.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The jar of flour will not be used up and the jug of oil will not run dry until the day the Lord sends rain on the land.

declarations.text: God's power sustains me, and I find strength through His Spirit.
declarations.bibleVerseText: He got up, ate and drank. Strengthened by that food, he traveled forty days and forty nights.

declarations.text: I listen for God's voice, and He speaks to me in stillness and peace.

declarations.text: I trust in God's direction, and He leads me on the right path.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Then the word of the Lord came to Elijah: 'Leave here, turn eastward and hide in the Kerith Ravine, east of the Jordan.'

declarations.text: God is my healer, and He brings life and restoration to me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord heard Elijah’s cry, and the boy’s life returned to him, and he lived.

declarations.text: I rely on God's strength, and He gives me courage in the face of fear.

declarations.text: God hears my prayers, and He answers with His mighty power.

declarations.text: I have faith in God's miracles, and He shows His power in my life.

declarations.text: God is my refuge, and I am protected in His care.

declarations.text: God's power is greater than any obstacle, and He leads me to victory.

declarations.text: I walk in obedience to God, and He blesses me with His favor.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Then the word of the Lord came to Solomon: 'As for you, if you walk before me faithfully with integrity of heart, I will establish your royal throne.'

declarations.text: God’s faithfulness never fails, and His promises are sure.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord said to him, 'I will establish your royal throne over Israel forever.'

declarations.text: God is my source of wisdom, and He gives me insight beyond understanding.
declarations.bibleVerseText: When all Israel heard the verdict the king had given, they held the king in awe, because they saw that he had wisdom from God.

declarations.text: I trust in God’s power, and He performs miracles in my life.

declarations.text: God leads me to places of provision, and I am never in need.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The jar of flour was not used up and the jug of oil did not run dry, in keeping with the word of the Lord spoken by Elijah.

declarations.text: I walk in God's strength, and He protects me from every enemy.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Then a prophet came to Ahab and said, 'This is what the Lord says: Do you see this vast army? I will give it into your hand today.'

declarations.text: God's power is at work in me, and I trust in His plans for my life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Then the word of the Lord came to Elijah: 'Leave here, turn eastward and hide in the Kerith Ravine.'

declarations.text: I trust in God’s guidance, and He establishes my plans with success.

declarations.text: God gives me the wisdom to lead others with humility and grace.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Solomon’s wisdom was greater than the wisdom of all the people of the East, and greater than all the wisdom of Egypt.

declarations.text: I honor God in my work, and He blesses me with provision and favor.

declarations.text: God is my provider, and He blesses the work of my hands.
declarations.bibleVerseText: In the fourth year the foundation of the temple of the Lord was laid, in the month of Ziv.

declarations.text: I trust in God’s protection, and He surrounds me with His peace.

declarations.text: God’s promises are my foundation, and I build my life upon them.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The temple was completed in all its details according to its specifications. He had spent seven years building it.

declarations.text: I seek God's guidance in all I do, and He leads me on the right path.

declarations.text: God provides for me even in times of need, and I trust in His provision.

declarations.bibleVerseText: The jar of flour was not used up and the jug of oil did not run dry, in keeping with the word of the Lord.

declarations.text: God’s power is mighty, and I find strength in His presence daily.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The fire of the Lord fell and burned up the sacrifice, the wood, the stones and the soil, and also licked up the water in the trench.

declarations.text: I call upon God in faith, and He answers with His mighty power.
declarations.bibleVerseText: At the time of sacrifice, the prophet Elijah stepped forward and prayed: 'Lord, the God of Abraham, Isaac and Israel, let it be known today that you are God.'

declarations.text: God hears my prayers, and I wait patiently for His perfect answer.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The seventh time the servant reported, 'A cloud as small as a man’s hand is rising from the sea.'

declarations.text: I trust in God’s protection, and He hides me in His shelter during storms.

declarations.text: God speaks to me in the stillness, and I hear His voice clearly.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord said, 'Go out and stand on the mountain in the presence of the Lord, for the Lord is about to pass by.'

declarations.text: I am never alone, for God is with me and leads me in His wisdom.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And after the fire came a gentle whisper. When Elijah heard it, he pulled his cloak over his face and went out.

declarations.text: God equips me for His purpose, and I step into my calling with faith.
declarations.bibleVerseText: So Elijah went from there and found Elisha son of Shaphat. He was plowing with twelve yoke of oxen.

declarations.text: God gives me boldness to fulfill His purpose, and I walk in His power.
declarations.bibleVerseText: So Elisha left him and went back. He took his yoke of oxen and slaughtered them. He burned the plowing equipment to cook the meat.

declarations.text: God strengthens me in weakness, and I find peace in His power.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But the prophet answered, 'Do not be afraid. Those who are with us are more than those who are with them.'

declarations.text: I am empowered by God’s Spirit, and I step forward in faith and confidence.
declarations.bibleVerseText: So the king of Israel advanced and struck down the Arameans, inflicting heavy casualties.

declarations.text: I trust in God’s power to heal, and He restores me completely.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Go back and tell Hezekiah, the ruler of my people, ‘This is what the Lord, the God of your father David, says: I have heard your prayer and seen your tears; I will heal you.'

declarations.text: God gives me double portion blessings, and I receive them with faith.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Let me inherit a double portion of your spirit, Elisha replied.

declarations.text: God performs miracles in my life, and His power flows through me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Elisha picked up Elijah’s cloak that had fallen from him and went back and stood on the bank of the Jordan.

declarations.text: I trust in God’s provision, and He multiplies all that I have.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The jar of flour will not be used up and the jug of oil will not run dry until the day the Lord sends rain.

declarations.text: God opens my eyes to see His protection surrounding me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Then the Lord opened the servant’s eyes, and he looked and saw the hills full of horses and chariots of fire all around Elisha.

declarations.text: I am confident in God’s power, and nothing is impossible for Him.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The man of God said, 'This is what the Lord says: About this time tomorrow, a seah of the finest flour will sell for a shekel.'

declarations.text: I trust in God’s ability to bring life and restoration.

declarations.text: God is my healer, and He cures me from every illness and affliction.

declarations.text: God’s word is true, and He always keeps His promises to me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The word of the Lord spoken through his servant Elijah was fulfilled.

declarations.text: I am blessed with God’s guidance, and He leads me to victory.

declarations.text: I call upon the Lord, and He hears and answers me with power.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Elisha prayed, 'Strike this army with blindness.' So he struck them with blindness, as Elisha had asked.

declarations.text: God restores everything I have lost, and I receive His favor.

declarations.text: God delivers me from all my enemies, and I walk in His victory.
declarations.bibleVerseText: He delivered them into the hands of Israel, and Israel struck them down.

declarations.text: I trust in God’s direction, and He helps me conquer every challenge.

declarations.text: I follow God’s commands, and He blesses me with peace and joy.

declarations.bibleVerseText: Pour oil into all the jars, and as each is filled, put it to one side.

declarations.text: I am obedient to God, and He blesses me with protection and safety.

declarations.text: God hears my prayers, and He answers me with miracles.

declarations.text: I trust in God’s power to rescue and deliver me from harm.

declarations.text: God surrounds me with His angels, and I find safety in Him.

declarations.text: God blesses me with peace, even in the midst of the storm.

declarations.text: I find strength in God, and His power sustains me in every situation.

declarations.text: I trust in God’s faithfulness, and He never fails me.

declarations.text: God heals my body, mind, and soul, and I receive His healing touch.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Go and wash yourself seven times in the Jordan, and your flesh will be restored.

declarations.text: I am strong and courageous because the Lord is with me.

declarations.bibleVerseText: Look to the Lord and his strength; seek his face always.

declarations.text: God’s faithfulness surrounds me, and I trust in His unchanging promises.
declarations.bibleVerseText: He remembers his covenant forever, the promise he made, for a thousand generations.

declarations.text: I sing praises to the Lord, for His greatness is beyond measure.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Sing to the Lord, all the earth; proclaim his salvation day after day.

declarations.text: I trust in God’s wisdom, and He gives me direction for my life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Yours, Lord, is the greatness and the power and the glory and the majesty and the splendor.

declarations.text: God’s word is my guide, and I follow Him with all my heart.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Now devote your heart and soul to seeking the Lord your God.

declarations.text: I am blessed because I honor God in all that I do.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Honor the Lord for the glory of his name. Worship the Lord in the splendor of his holiness.

declarations.text: I give thanks to the Lord, for He is my provider and protector.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Ascribe to the Lord the glory due his name; bring an offering and come before him.

declarations.text: God strengthens me, and I find courage in His presence.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Be strong and courageous, and do the work. Do not be afraid or discouraged, for the Lord God is with you.

declarations.text: God’s blessings are upon my life, and I am filled with joy and peace.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Splendor and majesty are before him; strength and joy are in his dwelling place.

declarations.text: I trust in God’s goodness, and He provides for all my needs.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Everything comes from you, and we have given you only what comes from your hand.

declarations.text: I am confident because God’s love surrounds me every day.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Praise be to you, Lord, the God of our father Israel, from everlasting to everlasting.

declarations.text: I seek God’s will in everything, and He directs my steps with wisdom.

declarations.text: I serve the Lord with a willing heart, and He blesses the work of my hands.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Now, my son, the Lord be with you, and may you have success and build the house of the Lord your God, as he said you would.

declarations.text: God’s promises are true, and He never leaves nor forsakes me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord God is with you, he will not fail you nor forsake you.

declarations.text: I trust in God’s power and might, and He is my strength and shield.

declarations.text: God’s strength is with me, and I face every challenge with courage.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Be strong and do not give up, for your work will be rewarded.

declarations.text: I walk in the Lord’s favor, and He leads me to success.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord made him exceedingly great in the sight of all Israel and bestowed on him royal splendor.

declarations.text: God’s love endures forever, and I give thanks for His faithfulness.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Give thanks to the Lord, for his steadfast love endures forever.

declarations.text: God’s wisdom is my guide, and I follow His ways with confidence.
declarations.bibleVerseText: In everything he undertook in the service of God’s temple and in obedience to the law and the commands, he sought his God and worked wholeheartedly.

declarations.text: I trust in God’s power to strengthen me for every task.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord gave David victory wherever he went.

declarations.text: I praise God for His greatness, and I am filled with joy and peace.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

declarations.text: God’s mercy is upon me, and I trust in His everlasting kindness.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For great is the Lord and most worthy of praise; he is to be feared above all gods.

declarations.text: God is my refuge, and I find strength and security in His presence.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Splendor and majesty are before him; strength and joy are in his dwelling place.

declarations.text: I walk in integrity, and God rewards my faithfulness.
declarations.bibleVerseText: David reigned over all Israel, doing what was just and right for all his people.

declarations.text: God’s power gives me victory over every obstacle in my path.
declarations.bibleVerseText: So David subdued the Philistines and took Gath and its surrounding villages.

declarations.text: I honor God with my life, and He grants me His favor and blessings.
declarations.bibleVerseText: All the nations brought tribute to Solomon, and he ruled over all the kings.

declarations.text: I seek God’s wisdom, and He leads me to prosperity and peace.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord gave Solomon wisdom, and the people were at peace with him.

declarations.text: God’s presence surrounds me, and I find joy in His holiness.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Let the heavens rejoice, let the earth be glad; let them say among the nations, ‘The Lord reigns!’

declarations.text: I praise God for His mighty works, and I stand in awe of His greatness.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Ascribe to the Lord the glory due his name; bring an offering and come before him.

declarations.text: I trust in God’s provision, and He blesses me with more than enough.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For everything in heaven and earth is yours. Wealth and honor come from you; you are the ruler of all things.

declarations.text: God’s plans for me are good, and I walk in His blessings daily.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Give praise to the Lord, for his love endures forever.

declarations.text: I trust in God’s promises, and He is faithful to fulfill every word.
declarations.bibleVerseText: He remembers his covenant forever, the promise he made, for a thousand generations.

declarations.text: God is with me, and I find strength and courage in His presence.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Be strong and courageous, for the Lord is with you.

declarations.text: I seek God’s will, and He directs my steps in righteousness.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Now devote your heart and soul to seeking the Lord your God.

declarations.text: God’s word is my guide, and I walk confidently in His truth.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord gave him success in everything he did, for the Lord was with him.

declarations.text: I trust in the Lord, and He strengthens me in every situation.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But as for you, be strong and do not give up, for your work will be rewarded.

declarations.text: God’s presence is with me, and He gives me courage and peace.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Do not be afraid or discouraged, for the Lord God, my God, is with you.

declarations.text: I seek God with all my heart, and He is found by me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But if you seek him, he will be found by you.

declarations.text: God’s grace surrounds me, and He fills my life with blessings.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord was with Jehoshaphat because he followed the ways of his father David before him.

declarations.text: I walk in obedience to God, and He establishes my steps.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord established the kingdom under his control, and all Judah brought gifts to Jehoshaphat.

declarations.text: God goes before me in every battle, and He grants me victory.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Do not be afraid or discouraged because of this vast army. For the battle is not yours, but God’s.

declarations.text: I give thanks to the Lord, for His love and mercy endure forever.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Give thanks to the Lord, for his love endures forever.

declarations.text: God hears my prayers, and He answers with power and miracles.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord appeared to Solomon and said: ‘I have heard your prayer and have chosen this place for myself.’

declarations.text: I trust in God’s power, and He delivers me from every challenge.
declarations.bibleVerseText: When we cry out to you in our distress, you will hear us and save us.

declarations.text: God blesses my efforts, and He brings success to all I do.
declarations.bibleVerseText: So the Lord established his kingdom, and Jehoshaphat had great wealth and honor.

declarations.text: I seek God’s guidance, and He shows me the path to victory.
declarations.bibleVerseText: You will not have to fight this battle. Take up your positions; stand firm and see the deliverance the Lord will give you.

declarations.text: I stand firm in faith, and God fights my battles for me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: You will not have to fight this battle. Stand firm and see the deliverance the Lord will give you.

declarations.text: I humble myself before God, and He lifts me up in His grace.
declarations.bibleVerseText: If my people, who are called by my name, will humble themselves and pray and seek my face, then I will hear from heaven.

declarations.text: God’s faithfulness surrounds me, and He keeps every promise He makes.
declarations.bibleVerseText: O Lord, the God of our ancestors, are you not the God who is in heaven? You rule over all the kingdoms of the nations.

declarations.text: I walk in the ways of the Lord, and He blesses me with peace.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The fear of the Lord fell on all the kingdoms of the land surrounding Judah, so that they did not go to war against Jehoshaphat.

declarations.text: God’s wisdom leads me, and He grants me understanding in all things.
declarations.bibleVerseText: God gave Solomon wisdom and very great insight, and a breadth of understanding as measureless as the sand on the seashore.

declarations.text: I am obedient to God’s word, and He prospers everything I do.
declarations.bibleVerseText: He sought his God and worked wholeheartedly. And so he prospered.

declarations.text: I praise God’s greatness, for His mercy and grace are endless.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Praise be to you, Lord, the God of our father Israel, from everlasting to everlasting.

declarations.text: God’s love endures forever, and I am surrounded by His goodness.
declarations.bibleVerseText: They sang to the Lord: 'He is good; his love endures forever.'

declarations.text: I seek the Lord with all my heart, and He strengthens me in every situation.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For the eyes of the Lord range throughout the earth to strengthen those whose hearts are fully committed to him.

declarations.text: I trust in God’s faithfulness, and He delivers me from all my troubles.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Lord, there is no one like you to help the powerless against the mighty.

declarations.text: God blesses me with wisdom and understanding to walk in His ways.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Give me wisdom and knowledge, that I may lead this people.

declarations.text: I find peace in God’s presence, and He leads me beside still waters.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Now let the fear of the Lord be on you. Judge carefully, for with the Lord our God there is no injustice.

declarations.text: God gives me victory in every battle, and I trust in His power.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord is with us; do not be afraid or discouraged.

declarations.text: I walk in the favor of God, and He establishes my steps.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Jehoshaphat became more and more powerful; he built forts and store cities in Judah.

declarations.text: God’s word is my guide, and I follow His commands with all my heart.
declarations.bibleVerseText: He followed the ways of his father David, not turning aside to the right or to the left.

declarations.text: God is my defender, and I am victorious because He fights for me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But with us is the Lord our God to help us and to fight our battles.

declarations.text: I humble myself before God, and He lifts me up in His strength.
declarations.bibleVerseText: When the Lord saw that they humbled themselves, this word of the Lord came to Shemaiah: 'Since they have humbled themselves, I will not destroy them.'

declarations.text: I rely on God’s wisdom, and He blesses me with success and peace.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The fear of the Lord fell on all the kingdoms of the land surrounding Judah, so that they did not make war with Jehoshaphat.

declarations.text: God hears my prayers, and He delivers me from every challenge.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But when they were in trouble and turned to the Lord, the God of Israel, and sought him, he was found by them.

declarations.text: God’s presence brings me joy, and His peace fills my heart.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Then all the people went to Jerusalem to celebrate the festival of unleavened bread for seven days with great rejoicing.

declarations.text: I trust in God’s faithfulness, and His promises never fail.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And God answered him, 'Because this was in your heart and you have not asked for wealth, possessions, or honor.'

declarations.text: God’s wisdom fills my mind, and I make decisions with clarity and peace.
declarations.bibleVerseText: So give your servant a discerning heart to govern your people and to distinguish between right and wrong.

declarations.text: God’s grace is with me, and I find strength in His love every day.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Because the hand of the Lord was on them, they brought them back to Judah and Jerusalem.

declarations.text: I seek God’s direction, and He leads me on paths of righteousness.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Jehoshaphat lived in Jerusalem, and he went out again among the people to bring them back to the Lord.

declarations.text: I trust in God’s protection, and He keeps me safe from all harm.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord blessed the king of Judah and gave him victory over his enemies.

declarations.text: God gives me the power to create wealth.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But remember the Lord your God, for it is he who gives you the ability to produce wealth.

declarations.text: The Lord blesses me and makes me rich without sorrow.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The blessing of the Lord brings wealth, without painful toil for it.

declarations.text: I prosper in all things and walk in divine health.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Beloved, I pray that you may prosper in all things and be in health, just as your soul prospers.

declarations.text: I seek God first, and all things are added to me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But seek first his kingdom and his righteousness, and all these things will be given to you as well.

declarations.text: I am blessed in the city and blessed in the field.
declarations.bibleVerseText: You will be blessed in the city and blessed in the country.

declarations.text: My barns are filled with plenty and my vats overflow.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Then your barns will be filled to overflowing, and your vats will brim over with new wine.

declarations.text: I am the head and not the tail; I will lend and not borrow.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord will make you the head, not the tail. You will lend to many nations but will borrow from none.

declarations.text: Wealth and riches are in my house, for I fear the Lord.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Wealth and riches are in their houses, and their righteousness endures forever.

declarations.text: I give and it is given back to me, pressed down and running over.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Give, and it will be given to you. A good measure, pressed down, shaken together and running over, will be poured into your lap.

declarations.text: I honor the Lord with my wealth and He blesses my increase.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Honor the Lord with your wealth, with the firstfruits of all your crops.

declarations.text: The Lord takes pleasure in my prosperity.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Let them shout for joy and be glad, who favor my righteous cause; and let them say continually, 'Let the Lord be magnified, who has pleasure in the prosperity of His servant.'

declarations.text: God supplies all my needs according to His riches.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And my God will meet all your needs according to the riches of his glory in Christ Jesus.

declarations.text: I sow generously and reap abundantly.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Whoever sows sparingly will also reap sparingly, and whoever sows generously will also reap generously.

declarations.text: I meditate on God’s Word and prosper in all I do.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But whose delight is in the law of the Lord... whatever they do prospers.

declarations.text: God makes my way prosperous and gives me success.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Then you will be prosperous and successful.

declarations.text: I am fruitful and multiply in every area of my life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Be fruitful and increase in number; fill the earth and subdue it.

declarations.text: I am like a tree planted by streams of water, bearing fruit in every season.
declarations.bibleVerseText: That person is like a tree planted by streams of water, which yields its fruit in season.

declarations.text: God opens the floodgates of heaven and pours out blessings upon me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: See if I will not throw open the floodgates of heaven and pour out so much blessing that there will not be room enough to store it.

declarations.text: I am diligent, and my hands bring abundance.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Diligent hands will rule, but laziness ends in forced labor.

declarations.text: The Lord prospers me so I can be a blessing to others.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And I will bless you, and make your name great, so that you will be a blessing.

declarations.text: I have abundance in every good work through God’s grace.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

declarations.text: I prosper because I am obedient to God’s Word.
declarations.bibleVerseText: If you fully obey the Lord your God... all these blessings will come on you and accompany you if you obey the Lord your God.

declarations.text: I am faithful with little, and God entrusts me with much.
declarations.bibleVerseText: You have been faithful with a few things; I will put you in charge of many things.

declarations.text: I am thriving.
The time of increase is now.
Prosperity is apart of my new identity.
God has given me the power and ability to get and stay wealthy.
I refuse to be poor.
Money comes to me easily.
I am wise with my time and resources.
I am very rich and wealthy.
I prosper in everything I do.
I have no lack in my life.
God delights in my prosperity.
I am blessed, prosperous and favored by God.
In Jesus' name, I am blessed with abundance, my cup overflows with His provision.
In Jesus' name, I attract wealth and success, for He has plans to prosper me.
In Jesus' name, I thrive in abundance.
In Jesus' name, I am a magnet for divine blessings, drawing wealth from unexpected sources.
In Jesus' name, I walk in financial freedom, debts canceled by His grace.
In Jesus' name, I sow generously and reap bountifully, my investments multiplied.
In Jesus' name, my work is rewarded with prosperity, my efforts crowned with success.
In Jesus' name, I am surrounded by favor, doors of opportunity swinging wide open.
In Jesus' name, I am empowered to build wealth, His spirit leading me to prosperity.
In Jesus' name, I live in the overflow, sharing generously from my abundance.
In Jesus' name, I claim victory over lack, living in the fullness of God's provision.
In Jesus' name, my finances are secure, protected by His promises of provision.
In Jesus' name, I am aligned with the rhythm of abundance, prosperity flowing in my life.
In Jesus' name, I am a testimony of His generosity, my life a reflection of His wealth.
In Jesus' name, I am rich in every way, my spirit enriched and my bank accounts full.
In Jesus' name, my future is filled with abundance.
In Jesus' name, I am anointed for prosperity.
In Jesus' name, wealth and honor accompany me, I live in the house of the Lord.
In Jesus' name, I embrace the kingdom's economy, where abundance is my birthright.
I command God's favor to bring me prosperity.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Surely, Lord, you bless the righteous; you surround them with your favor as with a shield.

declarations.text: I declare that the riches of God's kingdom are mine.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Seek the Kingdom of God above all else, and he will give you everything you need.

declarations.text: I command financial breakthroughs to manifest in my life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Give, and it will be given to you. A good measure, pressed down, shaken together and running over, will be poured into your lap.

declarations.text: I speak abundance and success into existence.
declarations.bibleVerseText: You will be enriched in every way so that you can be generous on every occasion, and through us your generosity will result in thanksgiving to God.

declarations.text: I declare that wealth flows into my life effortlessly.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The wealth of the rich is their fortified city; they imagine it a wall too high to scale.

declarations.text: I command all forms of prosperity to come to me now.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And whatever you ask in prayer, you will receive, if you have faith.

declarations.text: I speak God's favor and abundance over my finances.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And God is able to make all grace abound to you, so that having all sufficiency in all things at all times, you may abound in every good work.

declarations.text: I declare God's provision overflows in my life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: My cup overflows with blessings.

declarations.text: I command prosperity to take root in my life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But they delight in the law of the Lord, meditating on it day and night. They are like trees planted along the riverbank, bearing fruit each season. Their leaves never wither, and they prosper in all they do.

declarations.text: I work hard and receive the rewards of my efforts.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Work brings profit, but mere talk leads to poverty!

declarations.text: I honor the Lord with my wealth and He blesses me abundantly.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Honor the Lord with your wealth, with the firstfruits of all your crops; then your barns will be filled to overflowing, and your vats will brim over with new wine.

declarations.text: I am diligent in my work, and I prosper because of it.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Lazy people want much but get little, but those who work hard will prosper.

declarations.text: I trust in the Lord, and He makes me flourish like a tree by the river.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But blessed are those who trust in the Lord and have made the Lord their hope and confidence. They are like trees planted along a riverbank, with roots that reach deep into the water.

declarations.text: God blesses the work of my hands and increases my wealth.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The blessing of the Lord brings wealth, without painful toil for it.

declarations.text: I am like a tree planted by streams of water, bearing fruit in season.
declarations.bibleVerseText: That person is like a tree planted by streams of water, which yields its fruit in season and whose leaf does not wither—whatever they do prospers.

declarations.text: I bring my tithes to God, and He opens the windows of heaven for me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Bring all the tithes into the storehouse, so there will be enough food in my Temple. If you do, says the Lord of Heaven’s Armies, I will open the windows of heaven for you. I will pour out a blessing so great you won’t have enough room to take it in!

declarations.text: The Lord makes me rich and He is my source of happiness.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The blessing of the Lord makes a person rich, and he adds no sorrow with it.

declarations.text: I delight in God's Word, and He gives me the desires of my heart.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Take delight in the Lord, and he will give you the desires of your heart.

declarations.text: I am generous, and I am blessed with even more.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The generous will prosper; those who refresh others will themselves be refreshed.

declarations.text: I trust in God, and He makes me successful.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Commit your actions to the Lord, and your plans will succeed.

declarations.text: God supplies all my needs abundantly.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And my God shall supply all your need according to His riches in glory by Christ Jesus.

declarations.text: I prosper in all things and walk in health.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Beloved, I pray that you may prosper in all things and be in health, just as your soul prospers.

declarations.text: The Lord gives me the power to create wealth.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For it is He who gives you power to get wealth, that He may establish His covenant.

declarations.text: I am blessed to be a blessing to others.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I will bless you and make your name great; and you shall be a blessing.

declarations.text: God’s favor surrounds me and brings prosperity.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For You, O Lord, will bless the righteous; with favor You will surround him as with a shield.

declarations.text: I have more than enough because the Lord is my shepherd.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord is my shepherd; I shall not want.

declarations.text: Everything I do prospers because I delight in God’s Word.
declarations.bibleVerseText: He shall be like a tree planted by the rivers of water, that brings forth its fruit in its season, whose leaf also shall not wither; and whatever he does shall prosper.

declarations.text: The blessing of the Lord makes me rich and adds no sorrow.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The blessing of the Lord makes one rich, and He adds no sorrow with it.

declarations.text: I give freely and I receive abundantly.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Give, and it will be given to you: good measure, pressed down, shaken together, and running over.

declarations.text: God makes all grace abound toward me so I have everything I need.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And God is able to make all grace abound toward you, that you, always having all sufficiency in all things, may have an abundance for every good work.

declarations.text: I seek God first, and He provides all I need.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But seek first the kingdom of God and His righteousness, and all these things shall be added to you.

declarations.text: God opens doors of opportunity for me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For a great and effective door has opened to me, and there are many adversaries.

declarations.text: The work of my hands is blessed.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And the Lord will make you abound in prosperity, in the fruit of your body, in the increase of your livestock, and in the produce of your land.

declarations.text: I lend to many and borrow from none.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord will open to you His good treasure, the heavens, to give the rain to your land in its season, and to bless all the work of your hand. You shall lend to many nations, but you shall not borrow.

declarations.text: Wealth and riches are in my house because I fear the Lord.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Wealth and riches will be in his house, and his righteousness endures forever.

declarations.text: I honor the Lord with my wealth and He fills my life with abundance.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Honor the Lord with your possessions, and with the firstfruits of all your increase; so your barns will be filled with plenty, and your vats will overflow with new wine.

declarations.text: I am blessed in the city and in the field.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Blessed shall you be in the city, and blessed shall you be in the country.

declarations.text: God grants me wisdom to handle my finances wisely.
declarations.bibleVerseText: If any of you lacks wisdom, let him ask of God, who gives to all liberally and without reproach, and it will be given to him.

declarations.text: I am free from financial anxiety because I trust in the Lord.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Trust in the Lord with all your heart, and lean not on your own understanding.

declarations.text: My prosperity blesses others around me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The generous soul will be made rich, and he who waters will also be watered himself.

declarations.text: I sow generously and reap abundantly.
declarations.bibleVerseText: He who sows sparingly will also reap sparingly, and he who sows bountifully will also reap bountifully.

declarations.text: I do not lack any good thing because I seek the Lord.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The young lions lack and suffer hunger; but those who seek the Lord shall not lack any good thing.

declarations.text: I trust God’s financial provision even in tough times.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I have been young, and now am old; yet I have not seen the righteous forsaken, nor his descendants begging bread.

declarations.text: God’s abundance flows into my life so I can fulfill my purpose.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For the Lord your God will bless you in all your work and in all to which you put your hand.

declarations.text: I praise the Lord, for He is good and His love endures forever.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Give thanks to the Lord, for he is good; his love endures forever.

declarations.text: I will bless the Lord at all times; His praise is always on my lips.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I will bless the Lord at all times; his praise shall continually be in my mouth.

declarations.text: God is faithful to all His promises, and I praise Him for His truth.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For the word of the Lord is right and true; he is faithful in all he does.

declarations.text: I give thanks to the Lord, for His mercies are new every morning.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The steadfast love of the Lord never ceases; his mercies never come to an end; they are new every morning; great is your faithfulness.

declarations.text: I sing for joy because the Lord has done great things for me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord has done great things for us, and we are filled with joy.

declarations.text: I declare that God is my refuge and my fortress, and I trust in Him.
declarations.bibleVerseText: He is my refuge and my fortress, my God, in whom I trust.

declarations.text: I will exalt the Lord, for He has lifted me up.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I will exalt you, Lord, for you lifted me out of the depths.

declarations.text: I praise God, for He is my strength and my salvation.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord is my strength and my song; he has become my salvation.

declarations.text: I rejoice in the Lord always, for He is my joy and my song.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Rejoice in the Lord always. I will say it again: Rejoice!

declarations.text: God is my rock and my redeemer, and I will praise Him forever.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord lives! Praise be to my Rock! Exalted be God my Savior!

declarations.text: I give thanks in all circumstances, for God is always good.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Give thanks in all circumstances; for this is God’s will for you in Christ Jesus.

declarations.text: I worship the Lord in the beauty of holiness.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Worship the Lord in the splendor of his holiness; tremble before him, all the earth.

declarations.text: I trust in God’s faithfulness, and He will never fail me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Know therefore that the Lord your God is God, the faithful God who keeps covenant and steadfast love with those who love him.

declarations.text: The Lord is my shepherd, and I lack nothing.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord is my shepherd, I lack nothing.

declarations.text: I will praise the Lord among the nations and sing of His greatness.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I will praise you, Lord, among the nations; I will sing of you among the peoples.

declarations.text: The Lord is good, and His faithfulness continues through all generations.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For the Lord is good and his love endures forever; his faithfulness continues through all generations.

declarations.text: I praise God for His wonderful deeds and mighty works.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I will give thanks to you, Lord, with all my heart; I will tell of all your wonderful deeds.

declarations.text: I glorify God because His grace is sufficient for me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But he said to me, 'My grace is sufficient for you, for my power is made perfect in weakness.'

declarations.text: I bless the Lord with all my soul and remember His benefits.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Bless the Lord, O my soul, and forget not all his benefits.

declarations.text: I will lift up my hands and praise the Lord, for He is worthy.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Lift up your hands in the sanctuary and bless the Lord.

declarations.text: God is my rock, my fortress, and my deliverer, and I trust in Him.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord is my rock, my fortress and my deliverer; my God is my rock, in whom I take refuge.

declarations.text: I proclaim the greatness of the Lord, for He has done mighty things.
declarations.bibleVerseText: With my mouth I will make your faithfulness known through all generations.

declarations.text: I will declare God’s faithfulness in the morning and His love at night.
declarations.bibleVerseText: It is good to praise the Lord and make music to your name, O Most High, proclaiming your love in the morning and your faithfulness at night.

declarations.text: The Lord is my light and my salvation; I will not fear.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord is my light and my salvation—whom shall I fear?

declarations.text: I will thank the Lord because he is just; I will sing praise to the name of the Lord Most High.
O Lord, our Lord, your majestic name fills the earth!
I will praise you, Lord, with all my heart; I will tell of all the marvelous things you have done.
The Lord is king forever and ever!
I will sing to the Lord because he is good to me.
The LORD lives! Praise to my Rock! May the God of my salvation be exalted!
I am a new creation in Christ.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Therefore, if anyone is in Christ, he is a new creation. The old has passed away; behold, the new has come.

declarations.text: I am a child of God, loved and chosen by Him.
declarations.bibleVerseText: See what great love the Father has lavished on us, that we should be called children of God!

declarations.text: I am God’s masterpiece, created for good works.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For we are God’s handiwork, created in Christ Jesus to do good works, which God prepared in advance for us to do.

declarations.text: I am redeemed and forgiven through Christ.
declarations.bibleVerseText: In him we have redemption through his blood, the forgiveness of sins, in accordance with the riches of God’s grace.

declarations.text: I am seated with Christ in heavenly places.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And God raised us up with Christ and seated us with him in the heavenly realms in Christ Jesus.

declarations.text: I am the righteousness of God in Christ Jesus.
declarations.bibleVerseText: God made him who had no sin to be sin for us, so that in him we might become the righteousness of God.

declarations.text: I am a chosen and royal priesthood, set apart for God.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But you are a chosen people, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, God’s special possession.

declarations.text: I am more than a conqueror through Christ who loves me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: No, in all these things we are more than conquerors through him who loved us.

declarations.text: I am an heir of God and co-heir with Christ.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Now if we are children, then we are heirs—heirs of God and co-heirs with Christ.

declarations.text: I am the light of the world, shining for Christ.
declarations.bibleVerseText: You are the light of the world. A town built on a hill cannot be hidden.

declarations.text: I am set free in Christ, and I walk in freedom.
declarations.bibleVerseText: So if the Son sets you free, you will be free indeed.

declarations.text: I am an ambassador of Christ, representing His kingdom.
declarations.bibleVerseText: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us.

declarations.text: I am blessed with every spiritual blessing in Christ.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Praise be to the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us in the heavenly realms with every spiritual blessing in Christ.

declarations.text: I am the salt of the earth, bringing flavor and preservation.
declarations.bibleVerseText: You are the salt of the earth. But if the salt loses its saltiness, how can it be made salty again?

declarations.text: I am filled with the Spirit and empowered by God.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But you will receive power when the Holy Spirit comes on you; and you will be my witnesses.

declarations.text: I am a temple of the Holy Spirit, and God dwells in me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Do you not know that your bodies are temples of the Holy Spirit, who is in you, whom you have received from God?

declarations.text: I am strong in the Lord and in His mighty power.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Be strong in the Lord and in his mighty power.

declarations.text: I am victorious in Christ and walk in His triumph.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But thanks be to God! He gives us the victory through our Lord Jesus Christ.

declarations.text: I am clothed in Christ and walk in newness of life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For all of you who were baptized into Christ have clothed yourselves with Christ.

declarations.text: I am God’s workmanship, created for His glory.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For we are his workmanship, created in Christ Jesus for good works.

declarations.text: I am part of the body of Christ, united with other believers.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Now you are the body of Christ, and each one of you is a part of it.

declarations.text: I am justified by faith and at peace with God.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Therefore, since we have been justified through faith, we have peace with God through our Lord Jesus Christ.

declarations.text: I am chosen, called, and loved by God.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But we ought always to thank God for you, brothers and sisters loved by the Lord, because God chose you as firstfruits to be saved.

declarations.text: You made them only a little lower than God and crowned them with glory and honor.
You gave them charge of everything you made, putting all things under their authority.
I know the LORD is always with me. I will not be shaken, for he is right beside me.
I am safe because God is my refuge and strength.
declarations.bibleVerseText: God is our refuge and strength, a very present help in trouble.

declarations.text: No weapon formed against me shall prosper.
declarations.bibleVerseText: No weapon formed against you shall prosper, and every tongue which rises against you in judgment you shall condemn.

declarations.text: The Lord is my shield; I will not be afraid.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But You, O Lord, are a shield for me, my glory and the One who lifts up my head.

declarations.text: God protects me wherever I go.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord shall preserve your going out and your coming in from this time forth, and even forevermore.

declarations.text: I dwell in the secret place of the Most High and am safe.
declarations.bibleVerseText: He who dwells in the secret place of the Most High shall abide under the shadow of the Almighty.

declarations.text: God commands His angels to guard me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For He shall give His angels charge over you, to keep you in all your ways.

declarations.text: The Lord is with me; I will not fear.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord is on my side; I will not fear. What can man do to me?

declarations.text: Even when I face danger, God delivers me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Many are the afflictions of the righteous, but the Lord delivers him out of them all.

declarations.text: God is my rock and my stronghold; I am secure.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord is my rock and my fortress and my deliverer; my God, my strength, in whom I will trust.

declarations.text: I trust in the Lord and I am kept in perfect peace.
declarations.bibleVerseText: You will keep him in perfect peace, whose mind is stayed on You, because he trusts in You.

declarations.text: God’s protection surrounds me like a shield.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For You, O Lord, will bless the righteous; with favor You will surround him as with a shield.

declarations.text: The Lord rescues me from every trap.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Surely He shall deliver you from the snare of the fowler and from the perilous pestilence.

declarations.text: No harm will come near my home.
declarations.bibleVerseText: No evil shall befall you, nor shall any plague come near your dwelling.

declarations.text: The name of the Lord is my safe place.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The name of the Lord is a strong tower; the righteous run to it and are safe.

declarations.text: God protects me in times of financial struggle.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And my God shall supply all your need according to His riches in glory by Christ Jesus.

declarations.text: I have peace because Jesus has overcome the world.
declarations.bibleVerseText: In the world you will have tribulation; but be of good cheer, I have overcome the world.

declarations.text: God’s presence goes with me in every decision I make.
declarations.bibleVerseText: My Presence will go with you, and I will give you rest.

declarations.text: I am never alone; God is always watching over me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The eyes of the Lord are on the righteous, and His ears are open to their cry.

declarations.text: God’s protection gives me confidence in my future.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For I know the plans I have for you, says the Lord, plans to prosper you and not to harm you, to give you a future and a hope.

declarations.text: When I am weak, God strengthens and protects me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But the Lord is faithful, who will establish you and guard you from the evil one.

declarations.text: I am hidden in Christ, safe from every attack.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

declarations.text: God will never leave me nor forsake me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For He Himself has said, ‘I will never leave you nor forsake you.’

declarations.text: I will not fear disaster because God is my help.
declarations.bibleVerseText: God is our refuge and strength, a very present help in trouble.

declarations.text: I am safe in God's hands and nothing can separate me from His love.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For I am persuaded that neither death nor life, nor angels nor principalities nor powers, nor things present nor things to come, nor height nor depth, nor any other created thing, shall be able to separate us from the love of God which is in Christ Jesus our Lord.

declarations.text: The LORD is my rock, my fortress, and my savior; my God is my rock, in who I find protection.
He is my shield, the power that saves me, and my place of safety.
God’s way is perfect. All the LORD’s promises prove true. He is a shield for all who look to him for protection.
May he grant your heart’s desires and make all your plans succeed.
He guides me along right paths, bringing honor to his name.
Even when I walk through the darkest valley, I will not be afraid, for you are close beside me.
I am deeply loved by God with an everlasting love.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I have loved you with an everlasting love; I have drawn you with unfailing kindness.

declarations.text: Nothing can separate me from God’s love.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For I am convinced that neither death nor life, neither angels nor demons, neither the present nor the future, nor any powers... will be able to separate us from the love of God.

declarations.text: God’s love for me is greater than I can comprehend.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And may you have the power to understand, as all God’s people should, how wide, how long, how high, and how deep his love is.

declarations.text: I am chosen and dearly loved by God.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Therefore, as God’s chosen people, holy and dearly loved, clothe yourselves with compassion, kindness, humility, gentleness, and patience.

declarations.text: God’s love for me never fails.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Give thanks to the Lord, for he is good. His love endures forever.

declarations.text: God proved His love for me through Jesus.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But God demonstrates his own love for us in this: While we were still sinners, Christ died for us.

declarations.text: I am a child of God, loved beyond measure.
declarations.bibleVerseText: See what great love the Father has lavished on us, that we should be called children of God!

declarations.text: God rejoices over me with singing.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord your God is with you, the Mighty Warrior who saves. He will take great delight in you; in his love he will no longer rebuke you, but will rejoice over you with singing.

declarations.text: God’s love surrounds me every day.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But you, Lord, are a compassionate and gracious God, slow to anger, abounding in love and faithfulness.

declarations.text: The Lord delights in me because of His great love.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For the Lord takes delight in his people; he crowns the humble with victory.

declarations.text: I am rooted and established in God’s love.
declarations.bibleVerseText: That Christ may dwell in your hearts through faith—that you, being rooted and grounded in love.

declarations.text: God’s love for me is unshakable and everlasting.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Though the mountains be shaken and the hills be removed, yet my unfailing love for you will not be shaken.

declarations.text: I am precious in God’s sight and deeply valued.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Because you are precious in my eyes, and honored, and I love you.

declarations.text: I have been redeemed because of God’s great love.
declarations.bibleVerseText: In him we have redemption through his blood, the forgiveness of sins, in accordance with the riches of God’s grace.

declarations.text: God’s love covers all my sins.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Above all, love each other deeply, because love covers over a multitude of sins.

declarations.text: I love because God first loved me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: We love because he first loved us.

declarations.text: God’s love fills my heart through the Holy Spirit.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And hope does not put us to shame, because God’s love has been poured out into our hearts through the Holy Spirit.

declarations.text: The Lord is gracious and compassionate towards me.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The Lord is gracious and compassionate, slow to anger and rich in love.

declarations.text: God’s love is my refuge and strength.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But I will sing of your strength, in the morning I will sing of your love; for you are my fortress, my refuge in times of trouble.

declarations.text: God’s love gives me confidence and casts out all fear.
declarations.bibleVerseText: There is no fear in love. But perfect love drives out fear.

declarations.text: I am treasured and dearly loved by God.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For you are a people holy to the Lord your God. The Lord your God has chosen you out of all the peoples on the face of the earth to be his people, his treasured possession.

declarations.text: God’s love for me is greater than the heavens.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For great is your love, higher than the heavens; your faithfulness reaches to the skies.

declarations.text: I am surrounded by God’s unfailing love every day.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Surely your goodness and love will follow me all the days of my life.

declarations.text: The Lord’s love for me is never-ending and faithful.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For the Lord is good and his love endures forever; his faithfulness continues through all generations.

declarations.text: I have eternal life through Jesus Christ.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For God so loved the world that he gave his one and only Son, that whoever believes in him shall not perish but have eternal life.

declarations.text: I am a citizen of heaven, and my home is with the Lord.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But our citizenship is in heaven. And we eagerly await a Savior from there, the Lord Jesus Christ.

declarations.text: Jesus has prepared a place for me in heaven.
declarations.bibleVerseText: My Father’s house has many rooms; if that were not so, would I have told you that I am going there to prepare a place for you?

declarations.text: I will dwell with God, and He will wipe away every tear from my eyes.
declarations.bibleVerseText: He will wipe every tear from their eyes. There will be no more death or mourning or crying or pain.

declarations.text: I have an inheritance in heaven that will never fade away.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And into an inheritance that can never perish, spoil or fade. This inheritance is kept in heaven for you.

declarations.text: My name is written in the Lamb’s Book of Life.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Anyone whose name was not found written in the book of life was thrown into the lake of fire.

declarations.text: I will reign with Christ in eternity.
declarations.bibleVerseText: If we endure, we will also reign with him.

declarations.text: I am seated with Christ in heavenly places.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And God raised us up with Christ and seated us with him in the heavenly realms in Christ Jesus.

declarations.text: My reward is in heaven, and I live for eternal treasures.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Rejoice and be glad, because great is your reward in heaven.

declarations.text: I will see God face to face and dwell in His glory.
declarations.bibleVerseText: They will see his face, and his name will be on their foreheads.

declarations.text: I will join the angels and the saints in worshiping God forever.
declarations.bibleVerseText: After this I looked, and there before me was a great multitude that no one could count, from every nation, tribe, people and language, standing before the throne and before the Lamb.

declarations.text: I will receive a crown of life that never fades.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Blessed is the one who perseveres under trial because, having stood the test, that person will receive the crown of life.

declarations.text: I will be transformed into the glorious image of Christ.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But we know that when Christ appears, we shall be like him, for we shall see him as he is.

declarations.text: I will live forever in perfect peace and joy.
declarations.bibleVerseText: You will fill me with joy in your presence, with eternal pleasures at your right hand.

declarations.text: I will walk in the streets of gold in the New Jerusalem.
declarations.bibleVerseText: The great street of the city was of gold, as pure as transparent glass.

declarations.text: I will drink from the water of life, freely given by Jesus.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Let the one who is thirsty come; and let the one who wishes take the free gift of the water of life.

declarations.text: I will be clothed in white, pure and holy before God.
declarations.bibleVerseText: They have washed their robes and made them white in the blood of the Lamb.

declarations.text: My treasure is stored in heaven, where it can never be stolen.
declarations.bibleVerseText: But store up for yourselves treasures in heaven, where moths and vermin do not destroy, and where thieves do not break in and steal.

declarations.text: I will shine like the stars in God’s kingdom forever.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Then the righteous will shine like the sun in the kingdom of their Father.

declarations.text: I will celebrate at the wedding supper of the Lamb.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Blessed are those who are invited to the wedding supper of the Lamb!

declarations.text: I will dwell in the house of the Lord forever.
declarations.bibleVerseText: And I will dwell in the house of the Lord forever.

declarations.text: I have eternal security in Christ, and no one can snatch me from His hand.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I give them eternal life, and they shall never perish; no one will snatch them out of my hand.

declarations.text: I will inherit the kingdom prepared for me since the creation of the world.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Then the King will say to those on his right, ‘Come, you who are blessed by my Father; take your inheritance, the kingdom prepared for you since the creation of the world.’

declarations.text: I am saved by grace and have a glorious future in heaven.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For it is by grace you have been saved, through faith—and this is not from yourselves, it is the gift of God.

declarations.text: In my Father's house are many rooms.
They will be his people, and God himself will be with them.
Set your minds on things above, not on earthly things.
Our citizenship is in heaven.
There will be no more death or mourning or crying or pain.
I go to prepare a place for you.
The kingdom of heaven has come near.
He will wipe every tear from their eyes.
Store up for yourselves treasures in heaven.
The righteous will shine like the sun in the kingdom of their Father.
My kingdom is not of this world.
No eye has seen, no ear has heard what God has prepared for those who love Him.
To be absent from the body is to be present with the Lord.
The dwelling place of God is with mankind.
But we are looking forward to the new heavens and a new earth.
There before me was a door standing open in heaven.
In keeping with his promise we are looking forward to a new heaven.
Your reward in heaven is great.
This world is not our permanent home, we are looking forward to a home yet to come.
And so we will be with the Lord forever.
Blessed are those who are persecuted because of righteousness, for theirs is the kingdom of heaven.
The kingdom of God is within you.
Father, I want those you have given me to be with me where I am.
No more night! They will need no light from lamp or sun, for the Lord God will be their light, and they will reign forever and ever.
And death shall be no more, neither shall there be mourning, nor crying, nor pain anymore, for the former things have passed away.
Therefore we do not lose heart. Though outwardly we are wasting away, yet inwardly we are being renewed day by day.
I am eternally secure, for my place in heaven is guaranteed by faith
I face challenges with courage, knowing they are temporary compared to eternal joy
I am filled with hope, for my future home is overflowing with God's love
I cannot be defeated, for my ultimate victory lies in reaching heaven
I embrace setbacks as opportunities for growth, knowing they refine me for heaven
I am a champion in God's eyes, destined to dwell in His eternal kingdom
Every good deed is a treasure stored in heaven, building my inheritance
I walk through life with confidence, knowing my citizenship is in heaven
Difficulties cannot diminish my joy, for my true reward awaits in heaven
I persevere through trials, for my temporary suffering produces eternal glory
I embrace challenges as stepping stones, leading me closer to my heavenly home
I radiate hope, for my future shines bright with the promise of heaven
I overcome fear, for my eternal destination is one of perfect love
I live with purpose, for my journey on earth prepares me for the wonders of heaven
I find strength in knowing my struggles have meaning, shaping me for a glorious eternity
I face the unknown with faith, for my eternal home is a place of unimaginable beauty
I choose love over negativity, for heaven is built on the foundation of God's love
I release worry, for my future is secure in the promise of heaven.
I celebrate life's victories, big and small, for each one brings me closer to my heavenly reward.
I am unshakable, knowing my final destination is with God in heaven.
I am destined for greatness because heaven awaits me.
I am living with eternal perspective, focused on my heavenly home.
I am victorious in every challenge because heaven is my reward.
I am at peace, for my name is written in the book of life in heaven.
I am living joyfully, knowing heaven's joy awaits me.
I am transcending earthly troubles with my focus on heaven.
I am comforted in sorrow, for heaven promises no more tears.
I am living with courage, knowing my future is secure in heaven.
I am inspired to love, for love is the language of heaven.
I am beyond defeat, heaven's gates are open for me.
I am living in freedom, knowing that heaven is my eternal home.
I am embracing each day with the joy of heaven in my heart.
I am a reflection of heaven's light in this world.
I am secure in God's love, with heaven as my ultimate destination.
I am living in victory, with the promise of heaven before me.
Trust in the LORD and do good. Then you will live safely in the land and prosper.
Take delight in the LORD, and he will give you your heart’s desires.
Commit everything you do to the LORD. Trust him, and he will help you.
The LORD directs the steps of the godly. He delights in every detail of their lives.
I count it all joy when I face trials, knowing they strengthen my faith.
God gives me wisdom generously when I ask in faith.
I stand firm because my faith is tested, and I grow in perseverance.
Every good and perfect gift comes from above, from my Father of lights.
I am quick to listen, slow to speak, and slow to anger.
I am a doer of the Word, not just a hearer.
I walk in true religion by caring for those in need and keeping my life pure.
I do not show favoritism because I love others as God does.
Faith without works is dead, so I act in obedience to God.
I am justified by faith that produces good works.
I control my tongue and speak life, not destruction.
God’s wisdom in me is pure, peace-loving, and full of mercy.
I submit to God and resist the devil, and he flees from me.
When I draw near to God, He draws near to me.
I humble myself before the Lord, and He lifts me up.
I do not boast about tomorrow, for my life is in God’s hands.
When I know the good I ought to do, I do it.
The Lord’s coming is near, so I live with patience and endurance.
My yes is yes and my no is no; I speak with integrity.
When I am in trouble, I pray. When I am joyful, I sing praise.
The prayer of faith heals the sick, and the Lord raises them up.
I confess my sins and pray for others so that I may be healed.
The prayer of a righteous person is powerful and effective.
If I wander from the truth, I am restored by a brother or sister in Christ.
God gives grace to the humble, so I walk in humility.
I am chosen by God and set apart for His purpose.
I cast all my anxieties on God because He cares for me.
By Jesus’ wounds, I am healed and made whole.
I have been born again into a living hope through Jesus Christ.
My faith is being refined, and it is more precious than gold.
I am called to be holy as God is holy.
I have been redeemed by the precious blood of Jesus.
The Word of the Lord stands forever, and I trust in it.
I love deeply, for love covers a multitude of sins.
I am being built into a spiritual house, holy and acceptable to God.
I walk in humility, for God gives grace to the humble.
The Lord strengthens and restores me after I suffer for a little while.
I live in reverent fear, knowing that I am ransomed by Christ.
I declare praises to God, for He has called me out of darkness into His light.
I do not fear suffering for Christ, for His Spirit rests on me.
I do not repay evil with evil but bless others as God blesses me.
I am an heir of the gracious gift of life, and my prayers are powerful.
I am self-controlled and alert, resisting the enemy in faith.
God has called me to His eternal glory in Christ.
I live with an imperishable inheritance kept in heaven for me.
I keep my conduct honorable, that others may glorify God.
I entrust myself to God, my faithful Creator, in doing good.
I am free in Christ, and I use my freedom to serve others.
God has called me to His marvelous light, and I live in His glory.
God has given me everything I need for life and godliness.
I have great and precious promises from God.
I add to my faith goodness, knowledge, and self-control.
If I grow in godliness, I will never be ineffective or unfruitful.
I am called and chosen by God, and I make my calling sure.
If I stand firm in Christ, I will never stumble.
I will receive a rich welcome into the eternal kingdom of my Lord.
God’s Word is a light shining in a dark place.
Prophecy comes from God, and His Spirit reveals truth.
I guard my faith against false teachings and deception.
The Lord knows how to rescue the godly from trials.
I grow in grace and knowledge of my Lord Jesus Christ.
God is patient with me, not wanting anyone to perish.
I live a holy and godly life as I await the Lord’s return.
I look forward to the new heaven and new earth, where righteousness dwells.
I make every effort to be spotless, blameless, and at peace with God.
I am aware of false teachings and stand firm in the truth.
I grow in my faith daily through the knowledge of Christ.
Jesus is my Lord and Savior, and I walk in His grace.
I escape the corruption of the world through God’s divine nature.
I am diligent in growing in faith and godly character.
God’s promises allow me to share in His divine nature.
I stand firm in the truth of God’s Word.
I am not led astray by false doctrines, but I grow in Christ.
Jesus Christ is my righteousness, and I walk in His grace.
Jesus is the Alpha and the Omega, the Beginning and the End.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I am the Alpha and the Omega, the First and the Last, the Beginning and the End.

declarations.text: Blessed is the one who reads and takes to heart the words of this prophecy.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.

declarations.text: Jesus holds the keys of death and the grave; I have victory in Him.
declarations.bibleVerseText: I am the Living One; I was dead, and now look, I am alive forever and ever! And I hold the keys of death and Hades.

declarations.text: The Lord will wipe away every tear, and there will be no more pain.
declarations.bibleVerseText: He will wipe every tear from their eyes. There will be no more death or mourning or crying or pain, for the old order of things has passed away.

declarations.text: I overcome by the blood of the Lamb and the word of my testimony.
declarations.bibleVerseText: They triumphed over him by the blood of the Lamb and by the word of their testimony; they did not love their lives so much as to shrink from death.

declarations.text: Jesus is coming soon, and I live in readiness for His return.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Look, I am coming soon! My reward is with me, and I will give to each person according to what they have done.

declarations.text: I am more than a conqueror because Jesus has already won the victory.
declarations.bibleVerseText: They will wage war against the Lamb, but the Lamb will triumph over them because he is Lord of lords and King of kings—and with him will be his called, chosen and faithful followers.

declarations.text: I am blessed because I wash my robes in the blood of the Lamb.
declarations.bibleVerseText: Blessed are those who wash their robes, that they may have the right to the tree of life and may go through the gates into the city.

declarations.text: The Lord makes all things new; my future is filled with hope.
declarations.bibleVerseText: He who was seated on the throne said, 'I am making everything new!' Then he said, 'Write this down, for these words are trustworthy and true.'

declarations.text: I reign with Christ forever as a child of God.
declarations.bibleVerseText: There will be no more night. They will not need the light of a lamp or the light of the sun, for the Lord God will give them light. And they will reign for ever and ever.

declarations.text: The Lamb is my Shepherd, and He leads me to living water.
declarations.bibleVerseText: For the Lamb at the center of the throne will be their shepherd; he will lead them to springs of living water. And God will wipe away every tear from their eyes.

declarations.text: I worship God alone, for He is worthy of all glory and honor.
